ThingDef.label: Ruger Super Redhawk
ThingDef.description: A rather overkill double-action revolver, chambered for the powerful .454 Casull cartridge and fitted with a high power scope for good measure.

ThingDef.label: Ruger Super Redhawk Hornet
ThingDef.description: A high-capacity revolver which holds eight .22 Hornet cartridges. Its long barrel combined with its scope make it quite a long-ranged sidearm.

ThingDef.label: Ruger LCR
ThingDef.description: An extremely light double action revolver firing a small cartridge. Easy to handle but only holds 5 rounds, so make those shots count.

ThingDef.label: Ruger Vaquero
ThingDef.description: An old-style single action revolver. Very simple and reliable, but its manual operation makes it quite slow to use.

ThingDef.label: Taurus Model 455 Tracker
ThingDef.description: A very light double action revolver firing a small pistol cartridge.

ThingDef.label: Taurus Model 455 Tracker (Gold)
ThingDef.description: A very light double action revolver firing a small pistol cartridge. This one has been gold-plated.

ThingDef.label: Taurus Raging Bull 454
ThingDef.description: A rather overkill double-action revolver, chambered for the powerful .454 Casull cartridge.

ThingDef.label: Taurus Raging Bull 454 (Blue)
ThingDef.description: A rather overkill double-action revolver, chambered for the powerful .454 Casull cartridge.

ThingDef.label: Taurus Raging Bull 444
ThingDef.description: A large double-action revolver, chambered for .44 Magnum cartridges.

ThingDef.label: Colt Python 6"
ThingDef.description: A double action revolver firing a powerful pistol cartridge.

ThingDef.label: Colt Python 6" (Blue)
ThingDef.description: A double action revolver firing a powerful pistol cartridge.

ThingDef.label: S&W Model 686
ThingDef.description: A double action revolver firing a powerful pistol cartridge.

ThingDef.label: S&W Model 36
ThingDef.description: An ancient lightweight double-action revolver. Easy to handle but only holds 5 rounds, so make those shots count.

ThingDef.label: S&W Model 442 Crimson Trace
ThingDef.description: An extremely light double action revolver firing a small cartridge. Easy to handle but only holds 5 rounds. It features an integrated laser light in the side of the grip.

ThingDef.label: S&W Model 460V
ThingDef.description: Large and heavy 5-shot double-action revolver, chambered for the rare but powerful .460 Magnum cartridge. Can take .45 Colt or .454 Casull in a pinch.

ThingDef.label: S&W M&P R8
ThingDef.description: An 8 round double action magnum revolver, fitted with a reflex sight.

ThingDef.label: Beretta M9A1
ThingDef.description: Your typical 9mm duty pistol. Its steel-frame construction helps reduce some recoil.

ThingDef.label: Beretta 92FS
ThingDef.description: Your typical 9mm duty pistol. Its steel-frame construction helps reduce some recoil.

ThingDef.label: Beretta 92FS Inox
ThingDef.description: Your typical 9mm duty pistol. Its steel-frame construction helps reduce some recoil.

ThingDef.label: Beretta M9A3
ThingDef.description: Your typical 9mm duty pistol. Its steel-frame construction helps reduce some recoil. Fitted with a suppressor. Comes equipped with reflex and laser sights, and a compensator.

ThingDef.label: CZ 75 B
ThingDef.description: Your typical 9mm duty pistol. Its steel-frame construction helps reduce some recoil.

ThingDef.label: CZ 75 Compact
ThingDef.description: Your typical 9mm duty pistol. Its steel-frame construction helps reduce some recoil.

ThingDef.label: CZ P-07
ThingDef.description: A sleek and lightweight polymer-framed 9mm pistol, like many others. Easy to shoot and has a high magazine capacity, it makes for a popular everyday civilian carry handgun.

ThingDef.label: RD-9
ThingDef.description: A pistol-caliber carbine based on the AR-15 design, chambered for 9mm.

ThingDef.label: RD-45
ThingDef.description: A pistol-caliber carbine based on the AR-15 design, chambered for .45 ACP.

ThingDef.label: RD-300
ThingDef.description: A civilian sub-gun based on the AR-15 design, chambered for .300 Blackout.

ThingDef.label: SIG P226 Elite FS
ThingDef.description: Your typical 9mm duty pistol. Its steel-frame construction helps reduce some recoil.

ThingDef.label: SIG P250
ThingDef.description: An ancient pattern blowback-operated self-loading pistol. It lacks stopping power and range, but is quick to fire.

ThingDef.label: SIG P320
ThingDef.description: An ancient pattern blowback-operated self-loading pistol. It lacks stopping power and range, but is quick to fire.

ThingDef.label: SIG P320 SPECTRE Comp
ThingDef.description: A very precisely made pistol which features an integrated compensator, greatly effective in reducing recoil. Also fitted with a reflex sight for extra accuracy.

ThingDef.label: SIG P365
ThingDef.description: A compact 9mm pocket pistol with a light weight. Easy to aim but low range.

ThingDef.label: RIA Rock Standard FS
ThingDef.description: An ancient pattern blowback-operated self-loading pistol. It lacks stopping power and range, but is quick to fire.

ThingDef.label: RIA TAC Ultra FS HC
ThingDef.description: An ancient pattern blowback-operated self-loading pistol. It lacks stopping power and range, but is quick to fire.

ThingDef.label: RIA PRO Match Ultra 6
ThingDef.description: A long-barreled competition pistol with a heavy caliber. Its high recoil makes it quite unwieldy, but it is very deadly in the hands of a skilled shooter.

ThingDef.label: Colt Delta Elite
ThingDef.description: A familiar looking pistol, chambered for a very powerful caliber.

ThingDef.label: UDMC 2011 Custom
ThingDef.description: A very shiny looking pistol, chambered for a powerful pistol caliber.

ThingDef.label: Browning Black Label Medallion 380
ThingDef.description: A scaled down 1911 styled handgun chambered for a small cartridge. Made more for its looks than for real combat, but is still quite light and compact.

ThingDef.label: TEC-9
ThingDef.description: A relatively simple pistol design with a high-capacity magazine.

ThingDef.label: TEC-9 Auto
ThingDef.description: A relatively simple pistol design with a high-capacity magazine. Converted for fully automatic fire.

ThingDef.label: KelTec P32
ThingDef.description: A lightweight semi-automatic pocket pistol. Not much use in the battlefield, but very concealable.

ThingDef.label: Ruger Mark IV Standard
ThingDef.description: A lightweight semi-automatic pistol. Despite its underpowered cartridge, it remains one of the most prolific pistols of all time.

ThingDef.label: Ruger Mark IV Target
ThingDef.description: A lightweight semi-automatic pistol. Despite its underpowered cartridge, it remains one of the most prolific pistols of all time.

ThingDef.label: Ruger Mark IV 22/45 Lite
ThingDef.description: A somewhat garish yet accurate competition pistol. Fitted with a suppressor and a red-dot sight.

ThingDef.Name: HIDGun_RugerP345_Base
ThingDef.label: Ruger P345
ThingDef.description: A stylish, relatively-compact polymer-framed pistol. Low weight despite its use of high-powered .45 ACP ammunition, it makes for a great concealable sidearm if you can manage the recoil.

ThingDef.Name: HIDGun_RugerLCP_Base
ThingDef.label: Ruger LCP
ThingDef.description: An exceedingly lightweight semi-automatic pistol. Easy to shoot and very concealable, but greatly lacks stopping power.

ThingDef.Name: HIDGun_RugerSR9_Base
ThingDef.label: Ruger SR9
ThingDef.description: A sleek and lightweight polymer-framed 9mm pistol, like many others. Easy to shoot and has a high magazine capacity, it makes for a popular everyday civilian carry handgun.

ThingDef.label: FN Model 1910
ThingDef.description: A lightweight semi-automatic pocket pistol. Not much use in the battlefield, but very concealable.

ThingDef.label: Tokarev TT-33
ThingDef.description: An old style of semi-automatic pistol, chambered for an early cartridge with surprising armor penetrating capabilities.

ThingDef.label: Hi-Point YC9
ThingDef.description: An ancient pattern blowback-operated self-loading pistol. It lacks stopping power and range, but is quick to fire. Officially named the "Yeet Cannon".

ThingDef.Name: HIDGun_Glock17S_Base
ThingDef.label: Glock 17
ThingDef.description: A sleek and lightweight polymer-framed 9mm pistol, like many others. Easy to shoot and has a high magazine capacity, it makes for a popular everyday civilian carry handgun.

ThingDef.label: Glock 17 Auto
ThingDef.description: A sleek and lightweight polymer-framed 9mm pistol, like many others. Easy to shoot and has a high magazine capacity, it makes for a popular everyday civilian carry handgun. It can fire fully automatic thanks to a simple modification on the back of the slide.

ThingDef.label: Glock 19
ThingDef.description: A sleek and lightweight polymer-framed 9mm pistol, like many others. Easy to shoot and has a high magazine capacity, it makes for a popular everyday civilian carry handgun.

ThingDef.label: Glock 19 MOS
ThingDef.description: A sleek and lightweight polymer-framed 9mm pistol, like many others. Easy to shoot and has a high magazine capacity, it makes for a popular everyday civilian carry handgun. Fitted with a reflex sight.

ThingDef.label: FN Five-seveN
ThingDef.description: A lightweight pistol which uses small yet fast moving ammunition to better penetrate armor.

ThingDef.label: H&K USP 45
ThingDef.description: A full-sized polymer-framed .45 ACP pistol, like many others. Easy to shoot and has a decent magazine capacity, it makes for a popular everyday civilian carry handgun.

ThingDef.label: H&K USP 45 Tactical
ThingDef.description: A full-sized polymer-framed .45 ACP pistol, like many others. Easy to shoot and has a decent magazine capacity, it makes for a popular everyday civilian carry handgun. It is fitted with a suppressor and has a laser light for quick target acquisition.

ThingDef.label: H&K USP 9 Match
ThingDef.description: An ancient pattern target pistol. Its heavy counterweight on its barrel helps to negate recoil.

ThingDef.label: Desert Eagle
ThingDef.description: A large semi-automatic pistol which uses a gas operated system, similar to a rifle. Available in a variety of calibers, this one is chambered in the powerful .50 AE cartridge.

ThingDef.label: Desert Eagle Tactical
ThingDef.description: A large semi-automatic pistol which uses a gas operated system, similar to a rifle. Available in a variety of calibers, this one is chambered in the powerful .50 AE cartridge.\n\nFitted with a laser light and features an integrated muzzle brake to greatly reduce felt recoil.

ThingDef.label: Desert Eagle 44 Gold
ThingDef.description: A large semi-automatic pistol which uses a gas operated system, similar to a rifle. Available in a variety of calibers, this one is chambered in the powerful .44 Magnum cartridge and has been gold plated.

ThingDef.label: Desert Eagle L5 custom
ThingDef.description: A large semi-automatic pistol which uses a gas operated system, similar to a rifle. Available in a variety of calibers, this one is chambered in the powerful .50 AE cartridge.\n\nThe L5 is a modernized variant of the classic Desert Eagle, which is lighter, more compact, and features an integrated muzzle brake to greatly reduce felt recoil.

ThingDef.label: Savage Stance
ThingDef.description: A compact 9mm pocket pistol with a light weight. Easy to aim but low range.

ThingDef.Name: HIDGun_WaltherPDP_Compact_Base
ThingDef.label: Walther PDP Compact
ThingDef.description: A sleek and lightweight polymer-framed 9mm pistol, like many others. Easy to shoot and has a high magazine capacity, it makes for a popular everyday civilian carry handgun.

ThingDef.label: Walther P22Q
ThingDef.description: A lightweight and compact .22 pocket pistol. Designed for concealed carry, it's small caliber gives it a decent magazine capacity and less recoil at the cost of stopping power.

ThingDef.label: Walther PPQ 22
ThingDef.description: A full-sized target pistol designed for recreational shooting.

ThingDef.label: Walther PPK
ThingDef.description: Early design of concealed carry pistol. Easy to shoot and very compact, but greatly lacks stopping power.

ThingDef.label: Walther PPK Suppressed
ThingDef.description: Early design of concealed carry pistol. Easy to shoot and very compact, but greatly lacks stopping power. Fitted with a suppressor.

ThingDef.label: Walther PPK/s
ThingDef.description: Early design of concealed carry pistol. Easy to shoot and very compact, but greatly lacks stopping power.

ThingDef.label: Draco
ThingDef.description: A short-barreled stockless AK variant. Known to be highly impractical and inaccurate, it can still be much more lethal than most pistols.

ThingDef.label: Powell Knife Pistol
ThingDef.description: A single-shot pocket pistol with an integrated knife barrel.

ThingDef.label: American Derringer Model 4
ThingDef.description: A large pocket pistol, chambered for both .45 Colt and .410 Bore ammunition.
